0P0001FA09.TO.long_name: Cambridge Canadian Long-Term Bond Pool Class I
0P0001FA09.TO.summary: The fundâs investment objective is to generate income and capital appreciation by investing primarily in Canadian bonds. The fund would typically target an average portfolio duration of at least 9 years. Any change to the investment objective must be approved by a majority of votes cast at a meeting of unitholders held for that reason.
